title: Timed media primary asset reference
description: Asset information about the main content that was played, but present on all ads and chapters that occur during the content playback.

@id.title: Asset ID
@id.description: Identifier of the content, which can be used to tie back to other industry or CMS IDs.

dc:title.title: Content name
dc:title.description: The friendly, human-readable name of the timed media asset.

id3:Audio.title: Audio
id3:Audio.description: Metadata specific to audio content (record label, radio station, etc.).

xmpDM:artist.title: Artist
xmpDM:artist.description: The name of the album artist or group performing the music recording or video.

xmpDM:album.title: Album
xmpDM:album.description: The name of the album that the music recording or video belongs to.

xdm:Audio.title: Audio
xdm:Audio.description: Metadata specific to audio content (record label, radio station, etc.).

xmpDM:duration.title: Media content length
xmpDM:duration.description: Length of primary media asset in seconds.

xdm:showType.title: Show type
xdm:showType.description: The type of content for example, trailer or full episode.

iptc4xmpExt:Series.title: Series
iptc4xmpExt:Series.description: The series the show belongs to.

xdm:streamFormat.title: Stream format
xdm:streamFormat.description: Free-form format of the stream for example, short or long.

xdm:streamType.title: Stream type
xdm:streamType.description: The type of the media stream

meta:enum.audio: An audio stream (e.g. podcast, audiobook, radio stream).
meta:enum.video: A video stream (e.g. Video-On-Demand, live event stream, downloaded movie).

iptc4xmpExt:Season.title: Season
iptc4xmpExt:Season.description: The season the show belongs to.

iptc4xmpExt:Episode.title: Episode
iptc4xmpExt:Episode.description: The episode the show belongs to.

iptc4xmpExt:Genre.title: Genre
iptc4xmpExt:Genre.description: Type or grouping of content as defined by content producer.

iptc4xmpExt:Rating.title: Content rating
iptc4xmpExt:Rating.description: The rating as defined by Parental Guidelines.

iptc4xmpExt:Creator.title: Creator
iptc4xmpExt:Creator.description: Party or parties including person or organization which created the video, refinement by the role attribute.

xdm:firstAirDate.title: First air date
xdm:firstAirDate.description: The date when the content first aired on television.

xmpDM:releaseDate.title: First digital date
xmpDM:releaseDate.description: The date when the content first aired on any digital channel or platform.
